meanings.definition: To emit or send out radiation again.
meanings.sent1: The sun reradiates heat to warm the Earth.
meanings.sent2: The mirror reradiates light in multiple directions.
meanings.sent3: The cozy fireplace reradiates a comforting warmth throughout the room.
meanings.sent4: Her smile reradiates joy to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The lighthouse reradiates its guiding light to ships at sea.

meanings.definition: To reflect or scatter radiation back in all directions.
meanings.sent1: The shiny surface reradiates sunlight in all directions.
meanings.sent2: The atmosphere reradiates some of the sun's energy back into space.
meanings.sent3: The disco ball reradiates colorful lights across the dance floor.
meanings.sent4: The lake reradiates the sun's warmth, creating a pleasant atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The prism reradiates a beautiful spectrum of colors when light passes through it.
